scripts.test-shop-1.7.8.7-7.4: npm run build-shop -- 1.7.8.7-7.4-fpm-alpine && npx playwright test back front || true && mkdir -p allure-results-1.7.8.7-7.4 && for file in allure-results/*.json; do jq 'if has("labels") then .labels[] |= if .name == "parentSuite" then .value |= . + "-PS_Version_1.7.8.7-7.4" else . end else . end | if has("testCaseId") then .testCaseId |= . + "-1.7.8.7-7.4" else . end | if has("historyId") then .historyId |= . + "-1.7.8.7-7.4" else . end' "$file" > "$file.tmp" && mv "$file.tmp" "$file"; done && cp -r allure-results/* allure-results-1.7.8.7-7.4/ && rm -rf allure-results/*
scripts.test-shop-1.6.1.24-7.1: npm run build-shop -- 1.6.1.24-7.1-fpm-alpine && npx playwright test back front || true && mkdir -p allure-results-1.6.1.24-7.1 && for file in allure-results/*.json; do jq 'if has("labels") then .labels[] |= if .name == "parentSuite" then .value |= . + "-PS_Version_1.6.1.24-7.1" else . end else . end | if has("testCaseId") then .testCaseId |= . + "-1.6.1.24-7.1" else . end | if has("historyId") then .historyId |= . + "-1.6.1.24-7.1" else . end' "$file" > "$file.tmp" && mv "$file.tmp" "$file"; done && cp -r allure-results/* allure-results-1.6.1.24-7.1/ && rm -rf allure-results/*

scripts.test-all-version: npx npm-run-all --serial test-shop-1.7.8.7-7.4 test-shop-1.6.1.24-7.1 test-shop-1.7.8.11-7.4 test-shop-1.7.8.8-7.4 test-shop-8.1.0-8.1 test-shop-8.1.1-8.1 test-shop-8.1.5-8.1 test-shop-8.2.0-8.1 test-shop-nightly-nginx
scripts.merge-allure-results: rm -rf allure-results && mkdir allure-results && for dir in allure-results-*; do cp -r "$dir"/* allure-results/; done && rm -rf allure-results-*
